```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2, 3], 'b': [2, 3, 4], 'c': [1, 3, 5]},
...                   index=['tiger', 'zebra', 'cow'])
>>> df
 a   b   c
tiger   1   2   1
zebra   2   3   3
cow     3   4   5
>>> df.skew()
a   0.0
b   0.0
c   0.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> df.skew(axis=1)
tiger   1.732051
zebra  -1.732051
cow     0.000000
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2, 3], 'b': ['T', 'Z', 'X']},
...                   index=['tiger', 'zebra', 'cow'])
>>> df.skew(numeric_only=True)
a   0.0
dtype: float64 
```
